fields.description: The system is being designed, developed, or implemented
The system is undergoing a major change or development,
The system is no longer operational.
Some other state.
The system is actively in use to support mission functions.

fields.title: Add or remove hardware
fields.description: Add or remove hardware from physical systems either before deployment or within the data center.

fields.title: Install and Configure Software
fields.description: Install and configure software which requires root or administrator privileges

fields.title: Deploy updates
fields.description: Install OS updates, patches and hot fixes which require root or administer access

fields.title: Backups
fields.description: perform backups of VMs and Databases

fields.title: Add or remove database users
fields.description: Add, remove, and administrator database accounts and roles

fields.title: CRUD operations
fields.description: Perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on database

fields.title: Database Backups
fields.description: perform backups of database and administer database replication

fields.title: Debug Applications
fields.description: Connect to production servers and review logs system information or other files

fields.title: Run commands as service account
fields.description: Use of SUDO to deploy new software and restart applications

fields.title: Security assessments
fields.description: perform security assessments of new or existing applications and servers

fields.title: Administrator - Server
fields.description: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on physical servers

fields.title: Administrator - Virtual Machine
fields.description: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on virtual servers

fields.title: Administrator - Database
fields.description: Full control of RDBMS instance

fields.title: Debug Application
fields.description: Read only access to production application servers

fields.title: Administrator - Application
fields.description: Use of SUDO to deploy new software and restart applications

fields.title: Manage security systems
fields.description: Administrative access to systems that provide critical security services such as auditing systems or firewalls

fields.title: Perform security assessments
fields.description: perform security assessments of new or existing applications and servers
